finblock_options.description: Title of the FinBlock options page tab

finblock_replaceadswithcats.message: Replace ads with pictures of Finance
finblock_replaceadswithcats.description: Option on General tab used for enabling replacement of ads by pictures of cats

finblock_check_checkbox.message: Marca el campo con el set de imágenes que quieres usar.
finblock_check_checkbox.description: Shown on the FinBlock tab on the options page. Don't translate the word FinBlock.

finblock_add_more_photos.description: Introduction to the examples of custom image lists. Leave the and as they are.

finblock_example_flickr_search.description: First example of a custom image list that a user can add. Leave the and as they are. e.g. is shorthand for "for example".

finblock_example_flickr_id.description: Second example of a custom image list that a user can add. Leave the $example$ alone. e.g. is shorthand for "for example".

finblock_example_flickr_url.message: URL de la foto en Flickr (Ej. $example$)
finblock_example_flickr_url.description: Second example of a custom image list that a user can add. Leave the $example$ alone. e.g. is shorthand for "for example".

finblock_add_photos.description: Shown on the FinBlock tab of the options page. Users click this button to add a new list of images.

finblock_contributors.message: Tenemos una página para que conozcas a la gente detrás de FinBlock!
finblock_contributors.description: Link to the contributors page on the Support tab of the options

finblock_debuginlogoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
finblock_debuginlogoption.message: Mostrar datos de depuración en los logs de la consola (alenta el desempeño de FinBlock)

finblock_disableallextensions.message: Deshabilita todas las extensiones excepto FinBlock.

finblock_disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list
finblock_disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Lo siento, finblock está deshabilitado en esta página por una de tus listas de filtros.

finblock_disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted
finblock_disabled_on_this_page.message: FinBlock is disabled on this page.

finblock_disableforchromeandsafaristeptw.description: Step 2 for disabling Chrome and Safari extensions
finblock_disableforchromeandsafaristeptw.message: Desactiva la casilla "Activado" de cada extensión excepto finblock. Deja finblock activado.

finblock_enable_adblock.description: Link text to un-whitelist a page, displayed immediately after 'FinBlock is disabled on this page'

finblock_excludedomainorurl.message: El dominio o url de FinBlock no debería bloquear nada

finblock_latest_version.description: On the Options > Support page, shows when there are no updates available for FinBlock

finblock_malwarenotificationcheckboxmess.description: Checkbox displayed when subscribing to the Malware filter list on the Filter lists tab of the Options page
finblock_malwarenotificationcheckboxmess.message: Should FinBlock notify you when it detects malware?

finblock_safari50_updatenotice.description: A message shown to Safari 5.0 users urging them to upgrade
finblock_safari50_updatenotice.message: Estas usando una versión vieja de Safari. Descarga la versión más reciente para poder usar el botón de FinBlock en el toolbar para pausarlo, agregar sitios a tu whitelist y reportar anuncios. Actualiza ahora.

finblock_show_on_adblock_button.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

finblock_show_on_adblock_menu.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the FinBlock popup menu should show the number of ads blocked
finblock_show_on_adblock_menu.message: Show number of ads blocked on FinBlock menu

finblock_status_disabled.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that disallow extensions, such as the Extensions Gallery or about:blank
finblock_status_disabled.message: FinBlock no puede ejecutarse en este dominio.

finblock_status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when FinBlock is paused

finblock_storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser
finblock_storage_quota_exceeded.message: Excediste el limite de almacenamiento que FinBlock puede usar. Por favor desuscribete de algunas listas de filtros!

finblock_unpause_adblock.description: Link text to unpause FinBlock, displayed immediately after 'FinBlock is paused'

finblock_adblockupdates.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

finblock_update_available.description: On the Options > Support page, shows when there are updates available for CatBl
finblock_update_available.message:
Existe una actualización disponible de FinBlock! Ingresa a $here$ para actualizar.
Nota: Si deseas recibir actualizaciones automáticas, entra a Safari > Preferencias > Extensiones > Actualizaciones
y activa la opción 'Instalar actualizaciones automáticas'.

finblock_whatmakesadblocktick.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options
finblock_whatmakesadblocktick.message: Quieres ver lo que hace funcionar a FinBlock?

finblock_whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the whitelister dialog

finblock_wizardcantrunonframesets.description: Message (alert) shown when the user tries to use a blacklist/whitelist wizard on an old website
finblock_wizardcantrunonframesets.message: Ésta característica no funciona con este sitio porque usa tecnología vieja. Puedes agregar recursos a la blacklist o whitelist manualmente en la pestaña "Personaliza" desde la página de opciones.

finblock_you_can_slide_to_change.description: Instructions for how to use the whitelister slider controls. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.
finblock_you_can_slide_to_change.message: Puedes ir a la parte inferior para cambiar exactamente en qué paginas no se ejecutará FinBlock.

finblock_you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.
finblock_you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: Mientras más listas de filtros uses, FinBlock ejecutará más lento. Usar demasiadas listas puede incluso crashear tu explorador en algunos sitios. Pulse OK para suscribirse a esta lista de todos modos.

finblock_safarinotificationbody.description: Body of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules
finblock_safarinotificationbody.message: Please disable some filter lists. More information in FinBlock's Options.

finblock_adblock_outdated_chrome.description: Ad report page instructions to update AdBlock in Chrome. The link will point to 'chrome://chrome/extensions/'
finblock_adblock_outdated_chrome.message: You are using an old version of FinBlock. Please go to the extensions page, enable 'Developer mode' and click 'Update extensions now'

finblock_safaributton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Customize Toolbar' should match the text that Safari displays in the toolbar's context menu.
finblock_safaributton_how_to_hide2.message: To hide the button, right click Safari's toolbar and choose Customize Toolbar, then drag the FinBlock button out of the toolbar. You can show it again by dragging it back into the toolbar.

finblock_adblockreportinganad.description: Title of the ad report page

finblock_adblock_click_for_details.description: Tooltip on the AdBlock button, to help users understand that they can click the button, and that they can control the number badge that appears on the button.

finblock_adblock_wont_run_on_pages_match.description: Message displayed when the whitelister dialog will whitelist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.
finblock_adblock_wont_run_on_pages_match.message: FinBlock won't run on any page matching:

finblock_malwarenotificationmessage.description: Notification when a malware request has been blocked. This message should be under 90 characters!
finblock_malwarenotificationmessage.message: FinBlock has blocked a download from a site known to host malware.

finblock_safaricontentblockingpausemessa.description: Alert displayed after clicking 'Pause AdBlock' in the AdBlock menu while Safari Content blocking is enabled
finblock_safaricontentblockingpausemessa.message: To pause FinBlock with Content Blocking enabled, please select Safari (in the menu bar) > Preferences > Extensions > FinBlock, and uncheck 'Enable FinBlock'.
